metadata.title: CVE-2024-50256 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_reject_ipv6: fix potential crash in nf_send_reset6()I got a syzbot report without a repro [1]
